report_fields.sqlQuery:
SELECT mda.datim_agegroup AS age_group, mdp.gender AS sex, COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         INNER JOIN mamba_fact_patients_latest_patient_demographics mdp ON a.client_id = mdp.patient_id
         LEFT JOIN mamba_dim_agegroup mda ON mda.age = mdp.age
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
WHERE ltfp_days < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL
GROUP BY age_group, sex;

SELECT 'PWIDS', COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
        INNER JOIN (SELECT client_id from mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_summary where special_category='Current drug user' ) special_category on a.client_id = special_category.client_id
WHERE ltfp_days < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL

SELECT 'PIPS', COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
        INNER JOIN (SELECT client_id from mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_summary where special_category='In prison' ) special_category on a.client_id = special_category.client_id
WHERE ltfp_days < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL

SELECT mda.normal_agegroup AS age_group, mdp.gender AS sex, COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         INNER JOIN mamba_fact_patients_latest_patient_demographics mdp ON a.client_id = mdp.patient_id
         LEFT JOIN mamba_dim_agegroup mda ON mda.age = mdp.age
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
         INNER JOIN (SELECT mfehac.client_id
                     FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card mfehac
                              INNER JOIN
                          (SELECT client_id, MAX(encounter_date) AS encounter_date
                           FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
                           WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
                           GROUP BY client_id) a
                          ON mfehac.encounter_date = a.encounter_date AND mfehac.client_id = a.client_id
                     WHERE arv_regimen_days_dispensed < 86) less3months ON a.client_id = less3months.client_id
WHERE ltfp_days
    < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL
GROUP BY age_group, sex;

SELECT mda.normal_agegroup AS age_group, mdp.gender AS sex, COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         INNER JOIN mamba_fact_patients_latest_patient_demographics mdp ON a.client_id = mdp.patient_id
         LEFT JOIN mamba_dim_agegroup mda ON mda.age = mdp.age
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
         INNER JOIN (SELECT mfehac.client_id
                     FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card mfehac
                              INNER JOIN
                          (SELECT client_id, MAX(encounter_date) AS encounter_date
                           FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
                           WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
                           GROUP BY client_id) a
                          ON mfehac.encounter_date = a.encounter_date AND mfehac.client_id = a.client_id
                     WHERE arv_regimen_days_dispensed between 86 and 146) less5months ON a.client_id = less5months.client_id
WHERE ltfp_days
    < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL
GROUP BY age_group, sex;

SELECT mda.normal_agegroup AS age_group, mdp.gender AS sex, COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         INNER JOIN mamba_fact_patients_latest_patient_demographics mdp ON a.client_id = mdp.patient_id
         LEFT JOIN mamba_dim_agegroup mda ON mda.age = mdp.age
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
         INNER JOIN (SELECT mfehac.client_id
                     FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card mfehac
                              INNER JOIN
                          (SELECT client_id, MAX(encounter_date) AS encounter_date
                           FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
                           WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
                           GROUP BY client_id) a
                          ON mfehac.encounter_date = a.encounter_date AND mfehac.client_id = a.client_id
                     WHERE arv_regimen_days_dispensed > 176) less5months ON a.client_id = less5months.client_id
WHERE ltfp_days
    < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL
GROUP BY age_group, sex;

SELECT
    IF(weight.value_numeric >= 20, '20+', '<20') AS weight,
    mdp.gender as sex,
       COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         INNER JOIN mamba_fact_patients_latest_patient_demographics mdp ON a.client_id = mdp.patient_id
         LEFT JOIN mamba_dim_agegroup mda ON mda.age = mdp.age
      LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
         INNER JOIN (SELECT o.person_id, value_numeric
                     FROM obs o
                              JOIN (SELECT person_id, MAX(obs_datetime) obs_date
                                    FROM obs
                                    WHERE concept_id = 5089
                                      AND value_numeric IS NOT NULL
                                      AND voided = 0
                                      AND obs_datetime <= ':endDate'
                                    GROUP BY person_id) last_encounter ON o.obs_datetime = last_encounter.obs_date AND
                                                                          o.person_id = last_encounter.person_id
                     WHERE concept_id = 5089
                       AND voided = 0) weight ON a.client_id = weight.person_id
WHERE ltfp_days < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL AND mda.age < 15 
GROUP BY weight,sex;

report_fields.indicator_name: TX-CURR weight and sex and DTG
report_fields.sqlQuery:
SELECT IF(weight.value_numeric >= 20, '20+', '<20') AS weight, mdp.gender AS sex, COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         INNER JOIN mamba_fact_patients_latest_patient_demographics mdp ON a.client_id = mdp.patient_id
         LEFT JOIN mamba_dim_agegroup mda ON mda.age = mdp.age 
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
         INNER JOIN (SELECT o.person_id, value_numeric
                     FROM obs o
                              JOIN
                          (SELECT person_id, MAX(obs_datetime) obs_date
                           FROM obs
                           WHERE concept_id = 5089
                             AND value_numeric IS NOT NULL
                             AND voided = 0
                             AND obs_datetime <= ':endDate'
                           GROUP BY person_id) last_encounter ON o.obs_datetime = last_encounter.obs_date
                              AND o.person_id = last_encounter.person_id
                     WHERE concept_id = 5089
                       AND voided = 0) weight ON a.client_id = weight.person_id
INNER join mamba_fact_patients_latest_current_regimen regimen on regimen.client_id = a.client_id
WHERE ltfp_days
    < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL  AND mda.age < 15 
GROUP BY weight, sex;

report_fields.indicator_name: TX-CURR weight and sex and DTG above 15
report_fields.sqlQuery:
SELECT mda.normal_agegroup as age_group, mdp.gender AS sex, COUNT(DISTINCT a.client_id)
FROM (SELECT client_id, TIMESTAMPDIFF(DAY, MAX(return_visit_date), ':endDate') ltfp_days
      FROM mamba_fact_encounter_hiv_art_card
      WHERE encounter_date <= ':endDate'
        AND return_visit_date >= ':startDate'
      GROUP BY client_id) a
         INNER JOIN mamba_fact_patients_latest_patient_demographics mdp ON a.client_id = mdp.patient_id
         LEFT JOIN mamba_dim_agegroup mda ON mda.age = mdp.age 
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT * FROM person p WHERE p.dead = 1 AND p.death_date <= ':endDate') p
                   ON a.client_id = p.person_id
         LEFT JOIN (SELECT mf_to.client_id
                    FROM mamba_fact_transfer_out mf_to
                             LEFT JOIN mamba_fact_transfer_in mf_ti ON mf_to.client_id = mf_ti.client_id
                    WHERE transfer_out_date <= ':endDate'
                      AND (transfer_out_date > transfer_in_date OR mf_ti.client_id IS NULL)) mfto
                   ON a.client_id = mfto.client_id
         INNER JOIN mamba_fact_patients_latest_current_regimen regimen ON regimen.client_id = a.client_id
WHERE ltfp_days
    < 28
  AND p.person_id IS NULL
  AND mfto.client_id IS NULL AND mda.age >= 15 
GROUP BY age_group, sex;
